participant_abstract.sent: The meeting brought us all down to brass tacks.
We've had to fore-go the touch screen option because of limited budget and battery life options in our market.
But as the research shows, our voice recognition option is going to revolutitionize the market.
My findings were less than inspiring, but adding an element of natural and organic into the design will keep us up on current trends and give us an edge.

participant_actions.sent: The designers will begin work on the prototype and i will be focusing on some product evaluation.

participant_decisions.sent: Fold out function pad for more complex elements.

participant_problems.sent: The lack of cost information and availbable resources from manufactures and pilot tests made executive decisions hard. without important industry and market input we are running blind, but working with what we do have, i believe we are making progress on a highly innovative and interesting remote that may blow the hand-held technology market apart.
